title: NOS early USA spec indicater unit

posts.content:
Had this for a while, forgot I had it, it's an early unit, to be used with dip on the floor and in totally mint condition, has correct wires for USA spec so right for red rear flashers.
It needs the little jelly bean on the end, use your old one.
We all know how nice these are and when you need one you can't find one, no cheep but none of my NOS stock is or will be , we all love it when you compare to repro, nuff said....
I'll be at Viccy Farm if you want to view but don't touch.. if it's still for sale.
Â£250

Thanks
Rocket Ron
